oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Hillbilly Day, Madison, Tennessee, Nashville, Tennessee, 1958 October
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A scene from the October 1958 Hillbilly Day hosted in Madison, Tennessee. Forms part of Nashville Banner Negatives Collection. 1 photographic negative : b & w ; 4 x 5 in.
